author: dblevins
msg: Turned exceptions thrown regarding usage of @Remote and @Local into validation failures, dramatically improved the information given, and made them i18n messages.  These will now be printed in compiler-style errors rather than "hit the first invalid thing and immediately fail all deployment" style.
